output_list.reason: The 'reward' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the 'totalLockedRewardsOf' mapping, allowing a user to receive an excessive amount of GRX tokens.
The 'transferReward' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the 'totalLockedRewardsOf' and 'lockedRewardsOf' mappings, allowing a user to transfer an excessive amount of GRX tokens.
The 'unlockReward' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the 'totalLockedRewardsOf' and 'lockedRewardsOf' mappings, allowing a user to unlock an excessive amount of GRX tokens.
The 'increaseTotalSupply' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the 'balanceOf' and 'totalSupply' variables, allowing the owner to mint an excessive amount of GRX tokens.
The 'transfer' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the 'balanceOf' variable, allowing a user to transfer an excessive amount of GRX tokens.
